name: Shatter (itch) (Murilo Trigo)
description:
Can you break out of the loop?

A Lundum Dare 47 Jam submission: Stuck in a loop

Background Music: “Dream Escape” by The Tides from Youtube Audio Library

SFX: “Broken Bottle” by spookymodem (reversed in Audacity). All others SFX by Kenny

Font: “Broken Glass” by JLH Fonts

Color Palette: “Winter Wonderland” by Jimison3

All other assets, including art, design and programming were created during the jam using Godot 3.2 and Inkscape.
